content.raw:
Sorry - I didn’t catch the detail on renaming the topic.  

To me, this is still an RMS error that is consistent with our definition of RMS error in the documentation - we are specifying a value for “W” and adding some detail on how we calculate h\_i-h\_0.  Can we modify to leave the topic name the same?
